About.Description: I am a <1>passionate full-stack web developer</1>, specialized in building modern and efficient applications tailored to real user needs. Curious, detail-oriented, and always learning, I have a strong interest in <2>web technologies</2>, <3>cloud solutions</3>, <4>artificial intelligence</4>, and <5>cybersecurity</5>.<0/><0/>Based in <6>Ottawa, Canada</6>, I am available for both on-site and remote opportunities, and always ready to take on new challenges ðŸš€.

Home.Intro: Discover my projects, skills, and experiences.

Techs.Title: All technologies I use
Techs.React: JavaScript library for building modern user interfaces.
Techs.Php: Server-side scripting language mainly used for web development.
Techs.Tailwind: Utility-first CSS framework for rapid and responsive design.
Techs.Docker: Containerization platform for deploying and managing applications in isolated environments.
Techs.Azure: Microsoft suite for application lifecycle management, CI/CD, and deployment.
Techs.Dotnet: Open-source framework by Microsoft for building modern and high-performance web applications.
Techs.MySQL: Popular open-source relational database management system.
Techs.Git: Distributed version control system for source code management and collaboration.
Techs.Wordpress: Open-source content management system (CMS) for creating and managing websites.
Techs.Postman: Collaborative tool for testing, documenting, and automating APIs.
Techs.Laravel: Modern PHP framework for building robust and secure web applications.
Techs.Figma: Collaborative design tool for creating user interfaces and interactive prototypes.

Warehouse.Desc1: Receiving, sorting, and preparing packages for delivery.
Warehouse.Desc2: Using warehouse management tools to ensure product traceability.
Warehouse.Desc3: Strict compliance with safety and quality procedures.

Orange.Desc1: Development of web applications for the HR department.
Orange.Desc2: Implementation of full-stack web solutions with PHP, React.js, and Dotnet.
Orange.Desc3: CI/CD deployment via Azure DevOps and containerization with Docker.

Accent.Desc1: Design and development of web solutions with Laravel and React.js.
Accent.Desc2: Client needs analysis and performance optimization.
Accent.Desc3: MySQL database management and Git versioning best practices.

WP.Desc1: Creation and maintenance of showcase and e-commerce sites with WordPress.
WP.Desc2: SEO optimization, content management, and payment solution integration.
